comments.raw_text: We should add the version users upgraded from in the URL of the what's new page. Sometimes we need to target messages for certain install paths and we can't do so just using the UA.
comments.text: We should add the version users upgraded from in the URL of the what's new page. Sometimes we need to target messages for certain install paths and we can't do so just using the UA.
The what's new page is controlled by Firefox.
comments.creator: robert.strong.bugs@gmail.com

comments.raw_text: We could also probably (ab)use this to get some of the data requested in bug 575366 and bug 616048

comments.raw_text: Added Laura F and James Long who can provide more details on the Firefox web, I'm not sure of the technical implications and how we could track this.

comments.raw_text: I am thinking just a query parameter so in PHP we can tailor the page. That would also give us metrics just by looking at the apache access log.
